title: DAZ3D - Hi-Drama Iray Lights
description:
For decades artists and photographers have been using low light to convey a sense of mystery and suspense to their art, yet most people are used to lights that illuminate an entire scene, making each object equally important as the rest. While this may be useful for some images, broad lighting may not accurately convey the overall message of pieces with more dramatic intention. Shadows can conceal certain elements of the scene or can be used emphasize different aspects of the subject. Imagine light that becomes an active, participating character in your image. Low light quickly and easily allows you to focus in on various details, and immediately adds drama to an image. Lighting can make or break a render, and with tons of lighting and rendering options to choose from, the only question remaining is how much drama can you handle?

This set of 25 Iray lights is smart-propped to Genesis 3 Female in such a way that they will consistently have the same appearance, regardless of the pose. And while these lights were designed to accommodate most poses, depending on the extreme nature of some poses, minor adjustments to the lights may be necessary.

What's Included and Features

Hi-Drama Iray Lights: (.DUF)
25 Iray low-light presets for Genesis 3 Female
3 Light intensity settings
2 Render color settings
This product is designed for use on Genesis 3 Females in DS 4.9 or higher.
Textures Include:
1 Drama Map (4000 x 4000)
